pt.title: TD-3128 : Monitor de pressão arterial.

features: Forehead (children & adult election) and Surface measuring modes.

description.text: A wireless thermometer that automatically records and tracks measurements via Sanitas Remota™ mobile app and Sanitas Remota™ web application.
